effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
